items.title: Shokofin 4.0.0 Released
items.content_text: A feature-packed release with new major features, bug fixes, and an overhauled settings page!

items.title: Hello ShokoRelay
items.content_text: Learn about ShokoRelay, a new Plex Agent/Scanner loaded with features.

items.title: Lets Talk Themes
items.content_text: Learn how themes work in the new Web UI with multiple theme examples.

items.title: Shoko Version 4.2.0 Released
items.content_text: ARM64 Linux build, Shoko v5, SQLite improvements, and new Shokofin features.

items.title: Shoko Version 4.1.2 Released
items.content_text: Future of Shoko Desktop, sneak peak at the new Web UI and Jellyfin 10.8 support.

items.title: Nakamori 4.1.0 Released
items.content_text: Nakamori now compatibile with Shoko version 4.X.X

items.title: Shoko Version 4.1.1 Released
items.content_text: Update on Ashen & the Web UI with a maintenance release for Shoko.

items.title: Shoko 2021 Project Update
items.content_text: Outline of whats planned for Shoko and current status of each program/plugin.

items.title: Shoko Version 4.1.0 Released
items.content_text: Major code refactors and changes to the Renamer utility.
